headline: Chanel, Estée Lauder and LVMH Drive Expansion in Booming Luxury Perfume Market Forecast to Reach $46.04 Billion
summary: The luxury perfume market presents growth opportunities through rising personalization demand, expansion of retail networks, and e-commerce. Trends include AI-driven customization, sustainable ingredients, and wearable tech. Expanding in Asia-Pacific, leveraging influencer impact, and adapting to trade changes are key strategies. Luxury Perfume Market Luxury Perfume Market Dublin, Dec. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Luxury Perfume Global Market Report 2025" has been added to ResearchAndMarket

headline: e.l.f. Beauty Tumbles 38% in 2025: How to Play the Stock for 2026?
summary: ELF slides nearly 38% as tariffs, softer growth and rising costs squeeze margins, raising questions about the stock's setup heading into 2026.

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock to Target This Week and 2 We Question
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is home to the biggest and most well-known companies in the market, making it a go-to index for investors seeking stability. But not all large-cap stocks are created equal - some are struggling with slowing growth, declining margins, or increased competition.
